name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years in high-performance application delivery, specializing in **AWS**, **Azure**, **CI/CD**, and **Microservices**. Proficient in **Python** and **Java**, enabling robust API development using frameworks such as **FastAPI**. Skilled in automating and orchestrating infrastructure using **Terraform**, **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, and **Argo**, enhancing deployment efficiency and reliability.
Demonstrated expertise in building and maintaining cloud-native systems, ensuring compliance with industry standards. Strong background in automated testing and workflow orchestration with **Airflow** and **Databricks**. Proven ability to drive innovation in predictive analytics and real-time processing across healthcare and financial sectors.
